note: GenX gay/queer. Grew up rural; have lived in SF since '00. Love books & reading, all music, natural world. Preference for left policies/values, but suspicious of performative politics & politics-as-identity. Believer in democracy. Post-denominational, non-theist Jew. American Studies professor at a state undergrad-focused uni. Teach broadly in critical humanities. Research using Pragmatist social scientific & critical humanist methods: sexuality, religion, theory.

fields.name: I live on
fields.value: unceded land of the Yelamu, an independent tribe of the Ramaytush Ohlone
